about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in an enthralling Action-Platformer with metroidvania elements adventure! Embark on a thrilling journey as the chosen henchman of the clandestine Illuminati, navigating through a malevolent realm teeming with treachery. Your ultimate destination lies deep within the ancient recesses of a formidable castle, where the sinister will of the Illuminati awaits fulfillment.

Prepare to face formidable challenges, engaging in intense battles that will test your mettle, particularly during epic encounters with powerful bosses. As you progress, you must conquer an array of obstacles and insidious traps, that lie along your path, uncover the mysteries this ancient castle, shape the course of your fate, defy evil, but... Do your true desires match the goals set for you by your warders? Who is really evil here?

Key features:

  • The dynamic adventure with great music, featuring the cool musical artist "Starfounder".

  • Thrilling Boss Battles: Engage in intense encounters against formidable foes.

  • Tricky Obstacles and Traps: Overcome challenging hurdles and precision-based traps.

  • Uncover Ancient Secrets: Discover hidden lore and secret achievements.

  • Question Your Destiny: Navigate conflicting desires between the Illuminati and your journey.

About developer:

The game is developed by one person, inspired by old NES games. HATONE is a short game that is the developer's first creation to be released to the world.

short_description: Embark on an Action-Platformer with metroidvania elements odyssey as an Illuminati henchman. Navigate treacherous realms, battle fearsome bosses, overcome obstacles, and unravel secrets in an ancient castle. Fulfill your destiny, but beware: the Illuminati's intentions may not align with your own.
